013package org.apache.juneau.microservice.jetty;
014
015import org.eclipse.jetty.server.*;
016
017/**
018 * Interface for creating Jetty servers.
019 *
020 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
021 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../index.html#juneau-microservice-jetty">juneau-microservice-jetty</a>
022 * </ul>
023 */
024public interface JettyServerFactory {
025
026   /**
027    * Create a new initialized Jetty server.
028    *
029    * @param jettyXml The contents of the jetty.xml file.
030    * @return A newly-created but not-yet-started server.
031    * @throws Exception Any exception.
032    */
033   Server create(String jettyXml) throws Exception;
034}
